statements: SELECT * FROM escrow_details ORDER BY deposit_amount DESC;
SELECT seller_name, buyer_name, property_address FROM escrow_details WHERE funds_status = TRUE;
SELECT property_address, seller_name, buyer_name FROM escrow_details WHERE deposit_amount > 5000;
SELECT id, buyer_name, contract_conditions, funds_status FROM escrow_details ORDER BY id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM escrow_details WHERE seller_name LIKE 'John%' OR seller_name LIKE 'Mary%';
SELECT * FROM escrow_details WHERE deposit_amount > 5000 ORDER BY seller_name DESC;
SELECT property_address, buyer_name, funds_status FROM escrow_details WHERE funds_status = TRUE AND contract_conditions LIKE '%terms%'
SELECT id, property_address, buyer_name, deposit_amount FROM escrow_details WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM escrow_details WHERE buyer_name IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Johnson') ORDER BY deposit_amount DESC;
SELECT seller_name, contract_conditions FROM escrow_details WHERE id = 10 AND funds_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions;
SELECT seller_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts WHERE account_balance < 50000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT buyer_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT seller_name, buyer_name, transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE seller_name LIKE 'J%' OR buyer_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY seller_name ASC, buyer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT property_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM real_estate_transactions GROUP BY property_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM real_estate_escrow_details
SELECT id, property_address, escrow_date FROM real_estate_escrow_details WHERE status = 'closed'
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name FROM real_estate_escrow_details ORDER BY escrow_date DESC
SELECT SUM(escrow_amount) AS total_escrow FROM real_estate_escrow_details GROUP BY property_id
SELECT contract_conditions FROM contract_conditions WHERE condition_type = 'payment' ORDER BY condition_id ASC
SELECT * FROM real_estate_escrow_details WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, amount FROM transactions_funds WHERE type = 'deposit' AND currency = 'USD'
SELECT contract_id, condition_text FROM contract_conditions WHERE status = 'active' AND condition_type = 'financial'
SELECT * FROM real_estate_escrow_details WHERE amount > 100000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT id, status FROM transactions_funds WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM real_estate_transactions;
SELECT id, property_address, buyer_name FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE escrow_amount > 50000;
SELECT seller_name, seller_name AS seller FROM sellers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT buyer_name, email AS buyer_email FROM buyers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM escrow_details WHERE escrow_status = 'pending';
SELECT property_address, buyer_name, seller_name FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE escrow_amount > 50000 ORDER BY property_address ASC
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, escrow_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE escrow_amount BETWEEN 20000 AND 50000 ORDER BY escrow_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM buyers JOIN real_estate_transactions ON buyers.buyer_name = real_estate_transactions.buyer_name WHERE buyers.email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT seller_name, escrow_amount FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE seller_name LIKE '%Johnson%' AND escrow_amount > 100000 ORDER BY escrow_amount DESC
SELECT CONCAT(buyer_name, ' purchased property at ', property_address) AS purchase_details FROM real_estate_transactions WHERE escrow_amount > 75000 ORDER BY escrow_amount DESC, property_address ASC
SELECT * FROM real_estate_escrow LIMIT 10;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, property_address FROM real_estate_escrow WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT escrow_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM escrow_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_url FROM escrow_documents WHERE document_type = 'legal' ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM escrow_participants WHERE escrow_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT * FROM real_estate_escrow
SELECT id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM real_estate_escrow WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT * FROM escrow_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT escrow_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM escrow_transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed'
SELECT escrow_id, COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM escrow_documents GROUP BY escrow_id HAVING total_documents > 5
